entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
